remarks:
Theorem 19.12 of [Margaris] p. 89.  Assuming the converse is a mistake sometimes made by beginners!  But sometimes the converse does hold, as in ~ 19.12vv and ~ r19.12sn .  (Contributed by NM, 12-Mar-1993.)  (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 3-Jan-2018.) 

---

 Theorem 19.12 of [Margaris] p. 89.  Assuming the converse is a mistake sometimes made by beginners!  (Contributed by NM, 5-Aug-1993.)
statement: 19.12 $p |- ( E. x A. y ph -> A. y E. x ph ) $.
